title: Jacobs Project Support
description: JPS was created to support research, academic, and co-curricular projects with technical fabrication support, virtual design support from our Design Specialists, and pick-up arrangement. JPS offers a variety of fabrication methods, including laser cutting, 3D printing, and most of our other rapid prototyping processes. This is offered campus-wide, with project facilitation prioritized by user tiers. JPS is free to use with the exception of material costs.
